result.execSummary:
The defendant Allen P. Galowski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Marathon County Clerk of Circuit Court

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Allen P. Galowski

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk: Heather.
Case Called: 8:44 a.m. 
State appears by ADA Alex Lech in person. Defendant FAILS to appear, with Atty Shari Post appearing in person.
Date and time set for a final pre-trial/tentative plea.
VRCW.

ADA Lech is requesting a bench warrant and bond forfeiture hearing.
Atty Post makes no comment as to where her client is.
COURT authorizes BW $250.00.

DATES:
BFH: 6/15/22 @ 1:30 p.m.

Adjourned: 8:45 a.m. 



CASE RECALLED: 9:00 a.m. 
Same appearances, Defendant now appears.

COURT quashes warrant; vacates BFH.

Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. 

PLEA: 
CT 1 (Disorderly Conduct)>>NO CONTEST.

COURT advises defendant of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & questions defendant to understanding; 
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made: a factual basis & defendant guilty;

COURT ORDERS: CC plus DNA surcharge; DNA sample.  


Adjourned: 9:07 a.m.

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on May 5, 2022 at 09:20 am.

No contact with victim(s): Marshfield Medical Centers - unless for emergency services; may have contact through email only. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 2 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 2:31 p.m. 

State appears by ADA Alex Lech.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, with Atty Heather Roehr, in person.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
PLEA: NOT GUILTY on CMs

COURT ORDERS: $250.00 signature bond. 

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): Marshfield Medical Centers - unless for emergency services; may have contact through email only. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 2 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

DATES:
PTC W/JA: 5/5/22 @ 9:20 a.m.
